languages.text:
"Сейчас — наше время, а не их.
Идите в их дома. Вытаскивайте их из постелей.
Вскрывайте их тела, как туши на бойне.
Имперский флот, Касбаллика, Чорда, фон Валанциус — их имена больше ничего не значат. Завтра их сотрет из памяти.
Идите и берите власть, сколько сможете ухватить.
А Н В".

"Now is our time, not theirs.
Go to their homes. Drag them out of their beds.
Carve open their bodies like carcasses at a slaughterhouse.
The Imperial Navy, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius — their names mean nothing now. Tomorrow will erase them from memory.
Go and seize power, as much of it as you can carry.
A N V."
languages.original_text:

Go to their homes. Drag them out of their beds.
Carve open their bodies like carcasses at a slaughterhouse.
The Imperial Navy, the Kasballica, the Chordas, the von Valancius — their names mean nothing now. Tomorrow will erase them from memory.
Go and seize power, as much of it as you can carry.
A N V."

languages.text:
“如今是我们的时代，不再是他们的了。
去他们家里，把他们从床上拖下来。
剖开他们的身体，像屠宰牲畜一样。
帝国海军、卡斯巴利卡、库尔达、冯·瓦兰修斯——这些名字已经毫无意义了。到了明天，所有人都会遗忘他们。
去夺取权力吧，能夺取多少，就夺取多少。
安维尔。”
languages.original_text:
"Now is our time, not theirs.
Go to their homes. Drag them out of their beds.
Carve open their bodies like carcasses at a slaughterhouse.
The Imperial Navy, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius — their names mean nothing now. Tomorrow will erase them from memory.
Go and seize power, as much of it as you can carry.
A N V."

帝国海军、卡斯巴利卡、库尔达、冯·瓦兰修斯——这些名字已经毫无意义了。到了明天，所有人都会遗忘他们。
去夺取权力吧，能夺取多少，就夺取多少。
安维尔。”

languages.text:
«Es nuestro momento, no el suyo.
Id a sus casas. Arrancadlos de sus camas.
Destripadlos como al ganado en un matadero.
La marina imperial, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius... sus nombres ya no significan nada para nosotros. Mañana caerán en el olvido.
Id y haceos con el poder. Tanto como podáis llevaros.
A N V».
languages.original_text:
"Now is our time, not theirs.
Go to their homes. Drag them out of their beds.
Carve open their bodies like carcasses at a slaughterhouse.
The Imperial Navy, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius — their names mean nothing now. Tomorrow will erase them from memory.
Go and seize power, as much of it as you can carry.
A N V."

traits.locale_text:

Id a sus casas. Arrancadlos de sus camas.

La marina imperial, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius... sus nombres ya no significan nada para nosotros. Mañana caerán en el olvido.
Id y haceos con el poder. Tanto como podáis llevaros.
A N V».

languages.text:
「今こそ奴らではなく、我らの時。
奴らの棲家に赴いて、寝床から引きずり出すのだ。
畜殺場の死骸のようにその体を引き裂け。
帝国海軍、カスバリカ、チョーダ、フォン・ヴァランシウス…もはやその名に価値はない。明日には記憶から消されるのだ。
行け、力を掴め。その身に蓄えられるだけの力を手に入れろ。
A N V」
languages.original_text:
"Now is our time, not theirs.
Go to their homes. Drag them out of their beds.
Carve open their bodies like carcasses at a slaughterhouse.
The Imperial Navy, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius — their names mean nothing now. Tomorrow will erase them from memory.
Go and seize power, as much of it as you can carry.
A N V."

行け、力を掴め。その身に蓄えられるだけの力を手に入れろ。
A N V」

languages.text:
"Jetzt ist unsere Zeit, nicht die ihre.
Geht zu ihnen nach Hause. Zerrt sie aus ihren Betten.
Schneidet ihre Körper auf wie Tierleichen im Schlachthaus.
Imperiale Kriegsflotte, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius – ihre Namen bedeuten nichts mehr. Morgen werden sie aus dem Gedächtnis getilgt.
Reißt so viel Macht an Euch, wie Ihr schultern könnt.
A N V."
languages.original_text:
"Now is our time, not theirs.
Go to their homes. Drag them out of their beds.
Carve open their bodies like carcasses at a slaughterhouse.
The Imperial Navy, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius — their names mean nothing now. Tomorrow will erase them from memory.
Go and seize power, as much of it as you can carry.
A N V."

A N V."

languages.text:
« Cette époque est la nôtre, pas la leur.
Allez chez eux. Tirez-les de leur lit.
Ouvrez leur cadavre en deux, comme des carcasses à l'abattoir.
Marine Impériale, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius ; leur nom n'a plus d'importance. Demain, on les fera disparaître de l'histoire.
Emparez-vous de leur pouvoir, jusqu'à ne plus savoir qu'en faire.
A N V. »
languages.original_text:
"Now is our time, not theirs.
Go to their homes. Drag them out of their beds.
Carve open their bodies like carcasses at a slaughterhouse.
The Imperial Navy, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius — their names mean nothing now. Tomorrow will erase them from memory.
Go and seize power, as much of it as you can carry.
A N V."

languages.text:
"Devir artık onların değil, bizim devrimiz.
Evlerine girin. Yataklarından sürükleyerek çıkarın.
Karınlarını mezbahadaki leşler gibi deşin.
İmparatorluk Donanması, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius... Bu isimlerin artık bir anlamı yok. Doğacak yarın, onları hafızalardan silecek.
Gidin ve gücü ele geçirin. Bu uğurda her şey mübahtır.
A N V."
languages.original_text:
"Now is our time, not theirs.
Go to their homes. Drag them out of their beds.
Carve open their bodies like carcasses at a slaughterhouse.
The Imperial Navy, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius — their names mean nothing now. Tomorrow will erase them from memory.
Go and seize power, as much of it as you can carry.
A N V."

traits.locale_text:
"Zaman onların değil, bizim zamanımız.
Evlerine gidin. Yataklarından edin.
Mezbahada leşmiş gibi yarın cesetlerini.
İmparatorluk Donanması, Kasballica, Chorda, von Valancius... Bu isimler artık hiçbir şey ifade etmiyor. Yarın, anılarını temizleyecek.
Gidin ve elinizden geleni ardınıza koymayın.
A N V."
